title: Meteor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Call down a meteor at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your rock will deal a Powerful attack to your target and all their visitors.
- You may do this twice.
- You may instead perform the factional Rock kill.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"A meteor crashed into your house. You have died!"
"Their home was annihilated by a Meteor."

desc:
Post 123
*This world will crash and burn, even if only by your hand.*
